channel.title: Run Server problem
channel.description:
Well, my server keeps crashing (No ones onit but me im testin stuff) I compile. Nothings wrong but run server says something diffrent O_o!! i have no idea what this is this is what it says:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3 at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1349) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:27) Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

item.title: Run Server problem
item.dc:creator: @Markeh Markeh
item.description:
@Markeh wrote:

I know that but where :([br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 08:44:58 AM[/size][hr]hehe I think I posted this in the wrong section xD!!

item.title: Run Server problem
item.dc:creator: @runescapekid runescapekid
item.description:
@runescapekid wrote:

[quote=“Markeh, post:1, topic:91291”]Well, my server keeps crashing (No ones onit but me im testin stuff)
I compile. Nothings wrong but run server says something diffrent O_o!! i have no idea what this is
this is what it says:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1349)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:21)
at server.main(server.java:27)
Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/quote]

the bit that says
at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:1349)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:21)
at server.main(server.java:27)
that is where you have your error in the “npc handler”

Read full topic
